answerText: function [or subroutine; or procedure][10] This function, which is found in languages such as Python, takes in another function and an array, then applies the function to each item in the array. In one paradigm, it is combined with reduce.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 17 | 1 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These things are first-class in Javascript. For 10 points each: [10] Name these programming constructs that take in arguments and possibly return a value. In some OOP contexts, they are known as methods.
